application.doc: Setting the Runtime Components cluster replication state

method.name: PUT
method.id: Set the Security Verify Access Runtime Components cluster replication state
method.doc: To complete this operation with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP PUT command on the Runtime Components resource URI. Note: This web service can only be run on the cluster node that is the primary master.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: replicating
param.doc: True if the cluster should replicate key databases across each node, false to disable this functionality.
